item.title: EVEv2: Improved Baselines for Encoder-Free Vision-Language Models
item.description: EVEv2.0: A novel encoder-free vision-language model outperforms existing approaches by using a divide-and-conquer architecture and a data-efficient training strategy, achieving strong vision-reasoning…
